title: Bug 11935Can't Ctrl+Tab out of PDE Editor's dependencies page
description: Bug 11935Can't Ctrl+Tab out of PDE Editor's dependencies page Build: 20020319Steps:1.
OB: Press Tab or Ctrl+TabYou can't tab out of the combo box except by backwardstabbing with Shift+Tab.
SR: Open a plugin.xml file (it opens in the Plugin Manifest editor)2. Go to the Dependencies page3. Set focus on the "Find:" combo box under the heading Dependency Status4.
